metadata.Title: CVE-2021-27018 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description: The mechanism which performs certificate validation was discovered to have a flaw that resulted in certificates signed by an internal certificate authority to not be properly validated. This issue only affects clients that are configured to utilize Tenable.sc as the vulnerability data source.

criterions.comment: puppet package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
